message: Using latest is prone to errors if the image will ever update. Pin the version explicitly to a release tag
Use the `--no-cache` switch to avoid the need to use `--update` and remove `/var/cache/apk/*` when done installing packages
Use WORKDIR to switch to a directory
Pin versions in apk add. Instead of `apk add <package>` use `apk add <package>=<version>`

Set the SHELL option -o pipefail before RUN with a pipe in it. If you are using /bin/sh in an alpine image or if your shell is symlinked to busybox then consider explicitly setting your SHELL to /bin/ash, or disable this check
egrep is non-standard and deprecated. Use grep -E instead.
Use COPY instead of ADD for files and folders
